mapper.insert: insert into tb_custmst values( #{cust_cd}, #{cust_nm}, #{president_nm}, #{biz_no}, #{biz_cond}, #{biz_item}, #{biz_addr}, #{biz_tel}, #{biz_fax}, #{emp_id}, #{biz_flag}, CONVERT(CHAR(10),GETDATE(),23), null, 0 )
